code: import{client}from'../utils/fetchClient';export const getTodos=userId=>{return client.get("/todos?userId=".concat(userId));};export const deleteTodo=todoId=>{return client.delete("/todos/".concat(todoId));};export const createTodo=_ref=>{let{userId,title,completed}=_ref;return client.post('/todos',{userId,title,completed});};export const updateTodo=(todoId,updates)=>{return client.patch("/todos/".concat(todoId),updates);};
